component.name: The Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus XD
component.summary: Parodic Zelda fangame made with Solarus

description.p: The Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus XD is a parodic game that we released on April 1st, 2011. Though it’s a big April 1st joke, it’s a real, full game with two huge dungeons and 5-10 hours of playing.

It was developed in a very short period of time, thanks to coffee, beer and pizzas. Though the development has been rushed to ship on time, the game is complete, with lots of jokes, references and quirky NPCs.
